description.value:
Trigger A creature is within 30 feet of the Horrible Pond

Effect All PCs must attempt a @Check[will|dc:30] save, with results as described below. The pond then rolls initiative.

Critical Success The PC is unaffected

Success The PC feels compelled to reach for the grasping hands, but is otherwise unaffected.

Failure The PC is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 1} until the end of the pond's next turn and must use their first action on their next turn to move half their speed toward the pond.

Critical Failure The PC is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Controlled] and must use all their actions to walk into the pond, or swim in the pond if they are already in the water.

details.description: The illusion of a normal, if dirty, pond is broken by clammy hands reaching up from the depths. While they never break the surface, travelers feel compelled to reach for the grasping fingers and willingly walk to their doom.
details.disable: @Check[deception|dc:32], @Check[diplomacy|dc:32] or @Check[religion|dc:32] (expert) to calm the spirits; two successes required, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dispel Magic] (4th rank; counteract DC 32) to dispel the magic.

publication.title: Pathfinder Society Scenario #6-14: Twice in Steel

details.reset: When there are no living humanoids within 30 feet of the pond, the hands recede into the depths and the pond resets.
details.routine: (1 action) The pond attempts to Grab all PCs in the water with a [[/gmr 1d20+22 #Athletics]]{+22} Athletics bonus. Any @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Grabbed] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Restrained] PCs take @Damage[(4d12+26)[void]|traits:unholy] (unholy) damage (@Check[fortitude|dc:32|basic] save). All PCs within 30 feet must then make a save against Call of the Depths.
